Name: Poly
About the game: This is a first person shooter. use your weapon to damage and defeat all the enemies. There is multiple types of enemies. There is powerups for you to pick up so it will be easier to destroy all the enemies. You are going to have to defeat all the enemies in every wave to advance to the next. It is a low polygon game that's why it is called poly. Try to get a high score that nobody else can beat.
